tweet: Thanks to @CassCountyGovND Sheriff Paul D. Laney for many years of dedicated service to #Fargo community & Cass County. I joined him at his retirement celebration today & we wish him the best in all his future endeavors. pic.twitter.com/a5yU2I9L6R

Today, POTUS signed United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA). We appreciate the president’s work to secure better trade deals for our producers & industries, & look forward to congressional consideration of the USMCA ASAP. pic.twitter.com/B5sP8YLYo6

Brought @uspto Dir. Iancu to #Fargo today for my #StateofTech18 Conf., & this afternoon he also joined me at intellectual property roundtable at @NDSU. #NorthDakota’s brilliant & growing number of tech sector innovators deserve credit for their hard work. pic.twitter.com/Y7mquzSrye

#NorthDakota is a tech entrepreneurship powerhouse & we’re committed to supporting our state’s tech innovators who are driving ND’s 3rd wave of economic growth. That’s’ why I brought @SBALinda & @uspto Dir. Iancu to #Fargo for today’s #StateofTech18 conf. pic.twitter.com/leA31x8CEF

My #StateofTech conference w/ @FMWFChamber is today in #Fargo. @SBALinda, @uspto Director Iancu & Gov. @DougBurgum are headlining speakers & will be outlining how #NorthDakota’s tech businesses & entrepreneurs are fueling 3rd wave in our state’s economic growth. #stateoftech18

After working w/ homeowners at Patterson Lake & the #Jamestown Reservoir to advance legislation to enable them to purchase their lots, our bill is now heading to the president’s desk to be signed into law. More in this @dickinsonpress story: http://bit.ly/2Ska7iB

At @SenateAgGOP hearing today, I pressed @USDA Under Sec. of #Ag for Food Safety nominee Mindy Brashears to ensure that USDA has authority over labeling lab grown meat. Our ranchers do a tremendous job in producing high-quality, low-cost food, & consumers deserve transparency. pic.twitter.com/slmyDa5aTw

PASSED: My legislation enabling homeowners around Patterson Lake & #Jamestown Reservoir to purchase their lots has been approved by Congress & now goes to POTUS to be signed into law.  http://bit.ly/2BCExaD  pic.twitter.com/bc8KMigE9G

I nominated Luke Noah from Shanley HS in #Fargo to the @NavalAcademy. Luke is an outstanding student & active in sports including as an all-state soccer player. For more on service academies, click here:  http://bit.ly/2QZnhRS  pic.twitter.com/r52VUbBiGS
The #Minot Vet Center is officially opening the doors at its new location on South Broadway today. This new facility will help the center continue to serve #veterans & their families.

I nominated Jeffrey Corcoran from #GrandForks’ Red River HS to the U.S. Merchant Marine Academy. Jeffrey is a strong student & active in sports, scouts & his church. Find out more about service academies here:  http://bit.ly/2QZnhRS  pic.twitter.com/Lt7uo6srxe

Joined @connellmcshane on @FoxBusiness to discuss significance of POTUS meeting w/ China President Xi at G-20 summit this weekend & importance of addressing China’s unfair trade practices. pic.twitter.com/zxcAU5yk5y

#NorthDakota’s energy industry is resilient & innovative, which is why we’ve continued to produce >1 million barrels/day despite prolonged, low commodity prices. I discussed oil markets & need for stability w/ @ConnellMcShane on @FoxBusiness. https://twitter.com/connellmcshane/status/1067137943037452288 …

Congrats to hardworking folks at @NASA on successful landing of InSight spacecraft on Mars. Achievements like this help shape our identity & pride as a nation & expand our understanding of our world & universe. #MarsLanding

I nominated Logan Brown from Century HS in #Bismarck to the @AF_Academy. Logan is an outstanding student & participates in band & Science Olympiad & is an all-state soccer player & captain. I cosponsored a Senate resolution designating today as #SmallBusinessSaturday & to highlight vital role of each #smallbiz. Small businesses are the backbone of our economy, which is why we’re working to provide tax & regulatory relief to help them succeed. #ShopSmall pic.twitter.com/PAKu9pk7Qy

Did you know there are 30 million #smallbusinesses in America, 2 of every 3 net new jobs are created by a #smallbiz & that 10% of all U.S. businesses are owned by #veterans?
 
Do you need any more reasons to #ShopSmall today? #SmallBusinessSaturday

Today we celebrate #NativeAmericanHeritageDay & the enduring influence of Native Americans in helping shape our nation’s culture & history. As chairman of the @IndianCommittee, I’m working hard to advance Indian Country’s priorities & strengthen our govt.-to-govt. relationships. pic.twitter.com/NPuyzIsGyc
From Mikey and me – from our family to your family – we wish everyone in #NorthDakota & across this great nation a happy & blessed thanksgiving. #Thanksgiving2018 pic.twitter.com/Cz0ehWyu94
#HappyThanksgiving #Thanksgiving2018 pic.twitter.com/dQ3HUqSYzn

America is a truly blessed nation, & as we remember the pursuit of our ancestors to make a more perfect nation, we look on today with thanks & to the future with optimism. From Mikey, me & our entire family, we wish all North Dakotans a #HappyThanksgiving.

Congrats to administrators, teachers & students of Central Valley School in #Buxton. Earlier this year, their school was designated as a Natl. Blue Ribbon School in recognition of the school’s exemplary high performance. Our educators have an essential part in shaping our future. pic.twitter.com/PIUmzC13gV

At today’s monthly Drone Focus meetup in #Fargo, I updated #UAS & community leaders from the Red River Valley on new developments & ways we’re working to advance this exciting industry in #NorthDakota. #NDUAS Thanks to @DrekkerBrewing for hosting event & facility tour. pic.twitter.com/CbTq8O1nSA

I joined @1MillionCupsFar to outline how tax & regulatory relief are helping to create a pro-growth business environment to bolster #NorthDakota’s economic growth. Enjoyed participating in @XcelEnergyND’s #holidaylights parade in #Fargo. Thanks to all who worked to bring together this annual event – a highlight for the community. pic.twitter.com/XqZoSUqQNp

#NorthDakota has seen tremendous growth in its tech sector, & supporting technology entrepreneurship is a top priority. We need IT infrastructure & today I helped celebrate the opening of @Midcontinent’s $12 million Tier III data center in #Fargo. pic.twitter.com/Fm4hnB5xwG

Spoke at ND Assn of Soil Conservation Districts annual meeting to outline how we worked to make #Farmbill18 conservation programs more farmer-friendly. Mikey and I are deeply saddened to hear of the air ambulance crash last night near Mandan. Those on board were committed to serving others and providing life-saving medical care. We extend our condolences to their families and loved ones. https://twitter.com/bistrib/status/1064527262849146880 …

As @IndianCommittee chairman, I intro'd leg. designating Nov. as #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth to recognize their remarkable legacies & accomplishments. Thanks to those who’ve worked to complete new #Minot HWY83/Broadway Bridge. This new bridge will help facilitate a strong downtown for the next 50-75 years. pic.twitter.com/e8fG3QIgKM

This #VeteransDay, we mark the 100th anniversary of the end of WWI. We commemorate those who fought & honor their legacies. America is the greatest nation the world has ever known because of our veterans. #VeteransDay2018 pic.twitter.com/7pAG6jjeC1

We are grateful for the steadfast readiness & devotion to duty exemplified by the men & women of the @USMC. We commemorate their 242 years of faithful service to our nation. #MarineCorpsBirthday pic.twitter.com/wMoqYoj1lC

We appreciate Jeff Sessions’ many years of service to our nation. In the Senate & as Attorney General, he served the American people with dedication. We will work with the President to confirm a new AG who is well-qualified to lead the DOJ & will uphold the rule of law.

We’re forever indebted to our #veterans for their devoted service to our nation. Many veterans own small businesses which have vital roles in our communities & in our nation’s economy. This week is National Veterans Small Business Week & we celebrate our #VetBiz community.
